title: Searge: The Trendy Update"时尚更新“隐藏了一项亮点
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-4-2 15:23 编辑 



Searge:I'm considering to put secret features in snapshots again in the future. What do you think, are they cool or not?Searge:我正在考虑要不要在未来的快照里面添加秘密更新项. 你觉得呢，这样酷不酷？
Searge:Ok, the feedback was so positive, I decided to hide one feature in the latest snapshot. http://mojang.com/2016/03/minecr ... date-pre-release-1/Searge:Ok，反馈非常积极，我决定隐藏最新快照的一项亮点. http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-571475-1-1.html

ps：时尚更新亮点寻找开始，以及未来的快照又要猜谜了么？

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: 藏猫猫...别藏太深没人发现就好

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 上次我就发现了1.9更新的名字 隐藏在QR码中

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: 只要跟“隐藏”“猜谜”等有关的新闻，Searge一定是主角

replies.author: 张钰灝
replies.txt_content: 彩蛋？我觉得不要埋地太深，因为这是彩蛋233

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 其实这个隐藏亮点在告示牌上，1.告示牌变样子了，2.当你戴上RV时，所有的告示牌都会变成OBEY告示牌
